name: Playlist Generation
description: Generate a playlist taking your music files as input and generate using Genetic Algorithms either a text file containing the list or merge the entire list into a single music track.

name: Hand Gesture Recognition
description: The data model uses Deep learning, Convolutional Neural Networks and a dataset from Multi-Modal Dataset. The program then uses an algorithm to recognise the background, segments the hand gesture and then recognises the gesture.

name: GradBot
description: A simple bot implementation using logistic regression and Rivescript to estimate admit chances to a graduate university.

name: Predicting Hatred Tweets
description: Predict Hatred tweets from twitter using deep convolutional layers with multichannel input layers.

name: Decision Tree Classifier
description: Create any kind of Decision Tree Classifier with any dataset.

name: Random Forest Classifier
description: Create any kind of Random Forest Classifier with any dataset.
